Artificial Intelligence

Self Learning 3D Cars Using A Genetic Algorithm

Source code (GitHub)

Note

The 'success' of the AI is quite random, which mean that sometime you might want to reload this page and hope for a smarter AI.

FAQ:

Camera controls? Just use the "arrows or WASD or ZQSD"
What are the white strips on the circuit? The checkpoints used to reward the cars, +1 point per checkpoint.
What are the green lines on the leading car? The car's sensors, the "eye" of the car, it hit the ground and the "walls".
What is the red line on the leading car? The car's "ground sensor", it help reward the car when passing checkpoints.
What are the white/grey lines alongside the circuit? The skelton used to build the circuit, interpolated with a BSpline.

Technology

This project:

  • is develloped in C++.
  • use Bullet for the physic.
  • use OpenGL-ES/WebGL for the rendering.
  • use the emscripten compiler (C++ to JavaScript).
  • was created on a Linux OS (BUT Windows is doable).
